  1 10000000 00000000000000000000000
x 0 10000000 01000000000000000000000
------------------------------------
(1 10000001 01000000000000000000000)

(1) = 1 ^ 0 = 1

(2) = 10000000 - 01111111 = 00000001
	  10000000 - 01111111 = 00000001
	  00000001 + 00000001 = 00000010
	  00000010 + 01111111 = 10000001
	  
(3) = 100000000000000000000000 * 101000000000000000000000
	= 01010000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
	
	
	= _01_010000 00000000 00000000
	
========================================================================
  1 10001001 00000000001100000000000
x 1 10001010 00000000000010000000000
------------------------------------
  0 10010100 00000000001110000000000
  
(1) = 1 ^ 1 = 0	

(2) = 10001001 - 01111111 = 00001010
	= 10001010 - 01111111 = 00001011
	= 00001010 + 00001011 = 00010101
	= 00010101 + 01111111 = 10010100
	
(3) = 100000000001100000000000 * 100000000000010000000000 
	= [01000000 00001110 00000000] 01100000 00000000 00000000
